document.full_text: hugh hefner opens a new playboy club in london's swanky mayfair district on saturday after an absence of 30 years, and the imminent return of the "bunny girls" has some feminist groups and commentators hopping mad.
document.title: playboy club returns to london, some hopping mad
lines_and_colors: hugh hefner opens a new playboy club in london's swanky mayfair district on saturday after an absence of 30 years, and the imminent return of the "bunny girls" has some feminist groups and commentators hopping mad.
